description.value: A dragonflesh abomination's stomach is a bulbous pouch, about the size of a large football. The flesh-like sac churns with noxious acid. The stomach lining may be used to line armor and clothes, protecting them from acid. The stomach contents can be used by alchemists.Use: As an action, a creature may throw this sac at a point it can see within 20 feet, bursting on impact. All creatures within 5 feet of that point must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 5d6 acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
